Attacks.Name: Hyper Voice
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight and cover.

Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Incinerate special condition, removing 1 power from the target.

Attacks.Name: Fire Spin
Attacks.Effect: This attack targets all characters within its area of effect. Characters damaged by this attack gain the Incinerate special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Flash Fire
Superpowers.Effect: When Flareon is targeted by a Energy-type attack, it takes no damage and gains 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 3. That character gains the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Overheat
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Flareon's attack dice are reduced by 2 for its next attack.
